mapper.select: SELECT id, phone, login_type AS loginType, open_id AS openId, nickname, avatar_url AS avartarUrl, `level`, birthday, gender, gmt_last_login AS gmtLastLogin, last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp, `status`, gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM kxmall_user WHERE phone = #{phone} AND `password` = #{cryptPassword}
SELECT count(1) FROM kxmall_user WHERE gmt_create <= #{gmtCreate}
SELECT count(1) FROM kxmall_user WHERE gmt_create between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(1) FROM kxmall_user WHERE gmt_last_login between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(DISTINCT(o.user_id)) as num FROM `kxmall_order` o where o.status in (20,30,40,50) and gmt_update between #{start} and #{end}
